Summary: Round soft light directly above my head about 500ft. Covered by a single circlular door the moment I looked up at it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sanger
There were no other sightings in Sanger on or around January 28th 2012
divs: sighting details my house is located on a 2 acre property out in the country, which makes star gazing easy because there is no light polution coming from nearby cities and towns. i occasionally go outside at night to smoke a cigarette and\or relieve myself, i do the latter because it is convenient and so i don't wake up my wife or kids by flushing our noisy toilet as they go to bed earlier than i do. this also gives me a chance view the night sky which i enjoy very much. on this particular night in late january 2012, there was no moon visible that i can remember so it was very dark out and the stars shown brightly. about 12:30am i walked out to the west side of my shop which is about the size of a 2 car garage 50feet from my house and proceeded to do my business. as i stood there relieving myself i looked up at the stars as i often do. it was then when something drew my eye and i looked directly above my head... and saw a perfectly circular soft white light about 500 feet straight above me. it wasn't so much a projecting light, meaning it didn't give off a glare or aura or glow or beam. it looked more like a room that was brightly lit up from the inside and the circle shape i saw was an opening leading to this room. the circle shaped opening looked to be about 20 to 30 feet in diameter, and i could see no other shapes inside or the near outside of this light. about 1 second after i looked up at this light and noticed it, a single door or cover with a leading edge the same circumference as the circle began to close over the light from the direction of north to south... and soon the light was totally covered. this door or cover took 3-4 seconds to completly close over the light. i stood there for a moment and tried to make out the shape of a craft that would house this light, but it was too dark to see any exterior shape of any kind. i listend for any noise that would go along with what i just saw, but i heard nothing. the fact that this door or cover closed the very moment after i looked up at the light instantly made me very nervous. it seemed to me that whatever this light was it was reacting to me making eye contact with it. it gave me the feeling that this light would have continued uncovered had i not noticed it... like i was being watched and i caught someone watching me. it was then i said out loud to myself and in a way to whomever might be able to hear me speak, "okay". i spoke this one word nervously and sarcastically in a regular tone, meaning i didn't shout or whisper. it was in a way mocking the event i just witnessed. it was "okay" aliens are real. it was "okay" i saw you, you saw me... now what. it was "okay" i'm going back in the house now. it was an "okay" with multiple meanings, i have to admit it... i was scared. i walked back to the house a little faster than my normal gait. i did not look back to see if i could see anything from a different angle. and i did not go out again that night. since then i still go out at night to smoke, etc. nowadays however, i make a point to look directly above my head before looking in any other direction. and i have a camera standing by. i hope i don't need to use it. if this happens again it would mean it was less a chance encounter and more a vested intrest in me.
